attributes.action: Ban Smoking in Public Areas (Bars, clubs) in the Houses of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The smoking ban will not extend to Royal Palaces making the House of Commons exempt.  I'm convinced that this is an oversight by those who wish to impose this on the public.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several alreadly i existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/repeal-the-ban/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
